messages.message: anyone else seeing the frontend not load and crash with bundling errors after pulling master on crafting?
Yep, tried restarting th services and no luck so far

I wonder if its related to the kubernetes issue from above, the error I'm seeing is `E0307 19:10:30.936913   99826 memcache.go:265] couldn't get current server API group list: Get "http://crafting-aihub.k8s.g.sandbox/api?timeout=32s": net/http: request canceled (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)`
cc @sean.donohoe

that certainly does look related, and I think I came across the same problem when investigating the issue (my kubectl would just hang indefinitely) -- the only solution I'm aware of is to suspend and then resume your sandbox :melting_face:
I tried suspending/resuming and also the restarting with no luck. Going to try refreshing thte base image
let me know if it works, same is happening for me
Danny mentioned we can create a ibdev-backend sandbox for now to work
hey sorry, just got back from an appointment -- what are the names of your guys' sandboxes that are having issues?
Mine is `jessica`, it's still stuck on the customize home step after refreshing
:ack:  yeah something very strange is going on, I may need the crafting devs to investigate since it doesn't seem like something on our side

Just pinged them: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03B865Q74K/p1741383271348449?thread_ts=1741355999.540149&cid=C03B865Q74K

@Weiming Wu let's continue our discussion for your sandbox issues here, I believe these are all the same problem

Looks like the issue from earlier today happened again, crafting devs are investigating right now: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03B865Q74K/p1741384051549269?thread_ts=1741355999.540149&cid=C03B865Q74K

@Jessica I confirmed that interception successfully establishes on your sandbox after the restart, I'm sanity checking everyone's sandboxes now too
@Udit and @Jessica, your sandboxes should be back up now, could you confirm whether things look ok on your end?
It looks like mine is too!
